name: flying-gem
effect:
Held
:   When the holder uses a damaging flying-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
short_effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging flying-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A gem with an essence of air. When held,
it strengthens the power of a
Flying-type move only once.
